text: John Vincent Brennan (born August 16, 1937) is a retired United States Marine Corps officer and former political aide.http://www.providence.edu/library/archives/brennan/rppc_msbrennan.html He is best known as being U.S. President Richard Nixon's post-resignation chief of staff.Harry Benson, Ex-Leatherneck Jack Brennan Talks About Life with the Former President He Still Chooses to Serve , People, August 16, 1976, Accessed January 25, 2009. He was born in Fall River, Massachusetts. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Military people from Massachusetts Category:United States Marine Corps personnel
title: Jack Brennan
